message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $90 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. Based on my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
I'm glad you're willing to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $105.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $112.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am willing to pay $108 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. However, I still think the product is worth a bit more. I'm willing to sell it to you for $116.
Hello Alice, considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to pay $110 for it.
